remarks: The value of the function ` F ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
statement:
qlift.1 $e |- F = ran ( x e. X |-> <. [ x ] R , A >. ) $.
qlift.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. Y ) $.
qlift.3 $e |- ( ph -> R Er X ) $.
qlift.4 $e |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) $.
qliftval.4 $e |- ( x = C -> A = B ) $.
qliftval.6 $e |- ( ph -> Fun F ) $.
qliftval $p |- ( ( ph /\ C e. X ) -> ( F ` [ C ] R ) = B ) $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d R x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
